Name: Christmas Velvet Alexander
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and grated nutmeg.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Combining advocaat, gin and fino sherry, this is the ultimate stereotypical English Granny's Christmas Cocktail .
History: A Christmas cocktail inspired by the classic gin-based Alexander and the popular Brandy Alexander . Created in October 2011 by yours truly.
